note.snippet: ti ca vuccanti, nāmapaññattirūpattā nakkharanti khayavayaṃ na gacchantīti akkharā. ‘‘Nāmagottaṃ na jīratī’’ti
Ekapadasaṃyogeti kiṃ? Padantarasaṃyoge pare rassā mā hontūti. Maṃ ce tvaṃ nikhaṇaṃ vane,
, āgatāttha tumhe, sotukāmāttha tumhe, māyyo evarūpamakāsi, papaṃ avinduṃ
-pa+ādātaveti chedo, gaṇhituntattho, ruppatīti rūpaṃ, bujjhatīti buddho-dīgho, aggīva tappati, itthīva gacchati, nadīva sandati, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ, pitupaṭṭhānaṃ, yete dhammā ādikalyāṇā
, mādisesu kathāva kā, kinnumāva samaṇiyo madhuvā maññati bālo
– idha pubbasuttena saralopo, evaṃsa te āsavā pahīnā honti
, sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṃ, sājīvo garahito mama
Tīsu byañjanesu sarūpānaṃ dvinnaṃ ādibyañjanassa lopo – agyāgāraṃ
, ratyo, ratyā, ratyaṃ, sakvāhaṃ mārisa devānamindo
, pupphadānaṃ adāsahaṃ-adāsiṃ+ahanti chedo, bindulopo, puna pubbasaralopo, tuyhatthāya mahāmuni, tuyhevetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ
, tesāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi, pañcannetaṃ dhammānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, channetaṃ dhammānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, samaṇa tveva pucchāmi
, pidhānaṃ=apidhānaṃ, dvāraṃ pidahitvā=apidahitvā, gini=aggini, ratnaṃ=ratanaṃ, nhānaṃ=nahānaṃ, asnāti=asanāti, hanti=hanati, hanti kuddho puthujjano
, sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti. Katthaci bahuvacanampi dissati. Vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ varaṃ
Puttānañhi vadho dukho, mātigho labhate dukhaṃ, appassādā kāmā dukhā, natthi kāmaparaṃ dukhaṃ
, akkhāti=akkhāyati, gandhaṃ ghāti=ghāyati, abhiññā=abhiññāya, pariññā=pariññāya, adhiṭṭhā=adhiṭṭhāya, patiṭṭhā=patiṭṭhāya, āvīkatā hissa phāsu
, pakaṭṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ, pāsādo, pākāro, pāvassi megho, nagaraṃ pāvisi, pāvekkhi, pārisuddhi, pāṭipado, caturāsītisahassāni
, tathayidaṃ, yathariva amhākaṃ bhagavā, tathariva bhikkhusaṅgho, sammadeva samācare
Akkamo, parakkamo, akkhāto, aññā, aññindriyaṃ, aññātaṃ bhagavā, aññātaṃ sugata, attharaṇaṃ, apphoṭeti, alliyati, acchindati, assādo, ābhassaro, pabhassaro, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, jhānassa lābhimhi vasimhi
– idha paṭhamaṃ bindhulopo, sutā ca paṇḍitātyattha, sutā ca paṇḍitātyamhā
– atireko ayaṃ majjhimo khaṇḍotyattho, apuccaṇḍatā – aputiaṇḍatātyattho, jaccandho, jaccaghānako, jacceḷako, abbhuggacchati, abbheti, abbhokāso
-ke+assa puggalassāti attho, byapathayoti vacanapathā, yathā nāmaṃ tathā jhassa-ce+assāti chedo, tyāhaṃ evaṃ vadeyyaṃ
, tyassa pahīnā honti, putto tyāhaṃ mahārāja

, yyassa vippaṭisārajā, yyassa te honti anatthakāmā, yyassu maññāmi samaṇe-ettha ca avisiṭṭhepi vacanasadde ye+assāti padacchedabuddhisukhatthaṃ ‘yyassā’ti potthakāropanaṃ yujjatiyeva, yathā taṃ? ‘Yadāssa sīlaṃ paññañca’
iccādīsu viya, kvatthosi jīvitena me, yāvatakvassa kāyo, tāvatakvassa byāmo
, atha khvassa, atthi khvetaṃ brāhmaṇa, yatvādhikaraṇaṃ

note.original: moga. 5-136 (yuvaṇṇāna miya ṅu va ṅa sare)

note.snippet: Tiyantaṃ tyantaṃ – tattha tiyantanti iminā suttena siddhaṃ, tyantanti ‘yavā sare’ti suttena. Evaṃ sesesu. Aggiyāgāre agyāgāre, catutthiyatthe
gacchati, mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, mahāsammatotveva paṭhamaṃ akkharaṃ nibbattaṃ
evasadde pare aññati-kārassa vattaṃ. Vilapatveva so dijo
– ye+āhutyattho. Kadassu – ke+assu, yadeva te jātinissitā, tadeva te jarānissitāye+eva, te+evāti chedo, sve bhavo svātanaṃ

Puthujjano, puthubhūto-puthūti vā eko pāṭipadiko, puthunā puthunītipi dissati, apekkhiyāno apekkhiyānaapekkhitvātyattho. Evaṃ anumodiyāno, marīcikūpamaṃ abhisambuddhāno, mā maṃ pisācā khādantu, jīva tvaṃ saradosataṃ
, rattidivova so dibbo, mānusaṃ saradosataṃ-vassasatantyattho, anuyanti disodisaṃ

, sampatanti disodisaṃ-taṃ taṃ disantyattho, parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, aññoññaṃ aññamaññaṃ, ponopuññaṃ punappunaṃ, ponobbhavikā taṇhā-punoti vā eko nipāto, puno tassa mahe sino, puno pattaṃ gahetvāna, na ca dāni puno atthi, mama tuyhañca saṅgamo, na puno amatākāraṃ, passissāmi mukhaṃ tava
, pettikaṃ dhanaṃ, api no lacchasi, kacci no tumhe yāpetha, kathaṃ no tumhe yāpetha, sotukāmattha no tumhe bhikkhave, na no samaṃ atthi

note.original: jā. 1.1.94 sotatto sosindo ceva; ma. ni. 1.157
note.snippet: – imesu tīsu nusaddo ekaṃsatthe, sosito sotatto ceva
– avakandāmasetyattho, yaṃ karomasi brahmuno, tadajja tuyhaṃ dassāma
– so tena vacanena atthaṃ na abandhi na labhītyattho. Avhāyantu su yuddhena
pahāravacanena maṃ avhayantotyattho. Api nu hanukā santā
Pokkharañño, pokkharaññā, pokkharaññaṃ, samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, evaṃ brahmaññaṃ, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ
bhāvo paṇḍiccaṃ, santassa bhāvo saccaṃ, tathassa bhāvotacchaṃ, yajjevaṃ-yadi+evaṃ, najjo, najjā, najjaṃ, suhadassa bhāvo sohajjaṃ, vattabbanti vajjaṃ, jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati
Paligho, palibodho, palipanno, pallaṅko, taluṇo taruṇo, kalunaṃ paridevayi
Nāmamattaṃ na nāyati, animittā na nāyare
, ‘‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā’’ ti ettha pana uddissa tiṭṭhanaṃ uttiṭṭhanti attho. ‘‘Uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā
Uposatho – upavasathoti ṭhiti, nonītaṃ navanītaṃ, nivatthakoco nivatthakavaco, ko te balaṃ mahārāja, ko nu te rathamaṇḍalaṃ
Atrajo putto, khetrajo putto attajo, khettajo, gotrabhū, vatrabhū, citraṃ, vicitraṃ, cittaṃ, vicittaṃ, utrastamidaṃ cittaṃ
Indriyaṃ, sukho udayo yassāti sukhudrayaṃ, dukkhudrayaṃ kammaṃ
Acchi=akkhi, sacchi=sakkhi-saha akkhinā vattatīti atthe nipāto, paccakkhanti attho. Nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti
Ācero ācariyo, na mātāpitarasaṃvaḍḍho, anācerakule vasaṃ
, brahmacero brahmacariyo, tiṇhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ, taṇhā tasiṇā, suṇhā suṇisā, abhiṇhaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ, paṇho pubbaṇho, paṇhe vajjho mahosadho
Ekacciyo ekacceyyo ekacco, mātiyo macco, kiccayaṃ kiccaṃ, paṇḍitiyaṃ paṇḍiccaṃ, suvāmi sāmi, suvāmini sāmini, suvakehi puttehi sakehi puttehi, sattavo satto, tvañca uttamasattavo

Dīpaṅkaro, saṅkhāro, saṅgaho, sañcāro, sañjāto, saṇṭhitaṃ, attantapo, parantapo, amatandado, purindado, sandhi, sannidhi, sampatti, sambuddho, sambhavo, sambhāro, sambhinno, sammato iccādīsu niccaṃ, taṅkaro, taṃkaro iccādīsu aniccaṃ, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi
, na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu iccādīsu
Kvacitveva? Yametaṃ vārijaṃ pupphaṃ, adinnaṃ upasiṅghasi
Saññogo saṃyogo, saññutto saṃyutto. Saṃyojanaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, saññamo saṃyamo, saññato saṃyato, saññamati saṃyamati, saññācikā saṃyācikā kuṭiṃ
– māpetvā iccevattho, na cāpi apunappunaṃ, hatthibondiṃ pavekkhāmi
, idha pana pagosaddo eva, pageva vutyassa, pageva manussitthiyāti
, katamo nāma so rukkho, yassa tevaṃ gataṃ phalaṃ
Udaggo, udabbahi, udapādi, udayo, udāhaṭo, udito, udīrito, dubhato vuṭṭhānaṃ
– dve isayoti attho. Kiñcideva, kocideva, kismiñcideva, yāvadeva, tāvadeva, valutte-yāvade, tāvadeti siddhaṃ, punadeva, sakideva, sammadeva-dāgame rasso, sammadakkhāto
iccādīni. Tathā kena te idha mijjhati
, mamayidaṃ, soyeva, teyeva, taṃyeva taññeva, tehiyeva, tesaṃyeva tesaññeva, tasmiyeva, buddhoyeva, buddhesuyeva, bodhiyāyeva kāraṇā
Nirantaraṃ, niratthakaṃ, nirāhāro, nirābādho, nirālayo, nirindhano aggi, nirīhakaṃ, nirudakaṃ, nirutti, niruttaro, nirūmikā nadī, nirojaṃ, duratikkamo, durabhisambhavo, durāsadā buddhā
, sabbhireva samāsetha, nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṃ, vijjuriva abbhakūṭe, āraggeriva, usabhoriva
, ativiya lābhaggayasaggapatto, paraṃviya mattāya’’ iccādīsu iva, viyasaddā evatthe vattanti, tathā ‘‘yathariva, tathariva, varamhākaṃ bhusāmiva
Duvaṅgulaṃ, duvaṅgikaṃ, tivaṅgulaṃ, tivaṅgikaṃ, pāguññavujutā, vusitaṃ, vuttaṃ, vuccate, āsanā vuṭṭhāti
, hevaṃ vattabbe, hevaṃ vadati, ujū ca suhujūca
Appamādo, idhappamādo, vippayutto, sammappadhānaṃ, appativattiyaṃ dhammacakkaṃ
Abhikkantaṃ bho gotama abhikkantaṃ bho gotama
, vacanaṃ payirudāhāsi, garuṃ payirūpāsati, vandāmi te ayyire pasannacitto
– haññeyyāti ṭhiti, amūlamūlaṃ gantvā-mūlamūlaṃ agantvāti attho. Evaṃ paratra. Anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā
, animittaṃ katvā, saddhaṃ na bhuñjatīti asaddhabhoji, disvā padamanuttiṇṇaṃ
Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena, nāgakaññā caritaṃ gaṇena
